description:
“CURRENT PRICE” IS A GUIDE.  ALL OFFERS RESPECTFULLY CONSIDERED. 
General Description  Built on the success of the popular Moorings 4600 Catamaran, the all-new Moorings 4800 was designed in collaboration between The Moorings, architects Simonis-Voogd and builders Robertson & Caine.  Offering excellent performance under-sail and state of the art amenities; this yacht is the perfect vacation platform; ideal for 8 guests. Guests will enjoy a number of luxury amenities including a large forward cockpit with access to the main salon, an all-new design element that will be available, for the first-time ever, on a Moorings Yacht!  
The expansive main cabin features a full-entertainment center, a plush U-shaped settee, and a large dining table; all surrounded by windows offering 360-degree views of your beautiful surroundings.  The private guest staterooms are luxurious, bright, and airy with double beds, plenty of storage space for everything from swimsuits to evening attire, and en-suite lavatories with electric flushing toilets and enclosed stall showers. Since the yacht has a powerful generator sleeping in air-conditioned comfort while experiencing the wonders of a tropical paradise is assured.  The modern kitchen is second to none, with all that's needed to prepare gourmet meals that can be served at the table in the large cockpit shaded under a hardtop roof - the perfect setting for an al fresco dining experience or cocktails! The deck layout of the Moorings 4800 is ideally suited for relaxing, sunbathing, and swimming from the two-wide platforms at the rear of the yacht. A cross deck connects the two hulls, providing even more space to enjoy water sports of every kind, including; kayaking, stand-up paddle boarding and snorkeling.  The large deck area, at the bow, is an enchanting place to enjoy the quiet wash of the gentle waves against the hull as you sail the yacht to yet another exciting destination. Designed and built exclusively for The Moorings, the 4800 ranks as one of the finest charter yachts in the world!Actual Condition This is one of the better opportunities from the 48 X 4 R&Cs damaged in the Moorings fleet. She will need work but still has a lot left to start with. Veracruz III has 4-staterooms with 4 heads and TWIN 4 cyl Yanmars. We are told that she suffered damage about her hull, rails, and some in her cabin house. The helm top is on the deck. Port and starboard sides have rail damage, as well.  The engines are clean but some water was on the engine room floors; you may note the dipstick apparently shows little, if any, internal damage. The electrical panel appeared good; both outside and also dry on the backside.  The galley was complete as shown in the photos. The port and starboard hull staterooms do not appear to have suffered any major flooding and should clean well. Starboard staterooms stayed very dry. Generator and sail compartments visually appear to have stayed dry throughout the storm. There is no mast or boom, but the sail is shown in the photos. AGAIN, THIS IS ONE OF THE BETTER YACHTS FOR THIS TYPE OF PROJECT! Please inspect carefully before making an offer. *We always encourage potential Bidders/Buyers to view the item personally or have someone else inspect it for you prior bidding. It is entirely the buyer's responsibility to inspect and determine the vessel's actual condition. EquipmentA trailer is not included in this sale. Engines Please read Motors and Machinery Disclaimer. Motors and Machinery DisclaimerNo statement of condition can be made regarding motors, engines or machinery, whatsoever. A photo may appear of the engine compartment and machinery, but it is entirely the buyers responsibility to inspect and determine their actual condition.  "VERACRUZ III" VB /LAM

name: great point
description:
“CURRENT PRICE” IS A GUIDE.  ALL OFFERS RESPECTFULLY CONSIDERED.  
General Description  The Sunsail 484 Catamaran, with excellent performance under sail, and plenty of space above and below, is the perfect yacht for sailing with a large group of friends and family.   Actual Condition It is reported this Sunsail 484 suffered damage in Hurricane Marina. There was water intrusion and flooding in the stbd hull, exterior and top side scuffing, and general damage. There appears to be several stanchions that are in good condition. The port hull stayed dry and appears generally clean and the cabins in the port hull show to be in good condition.  
The galley and galley equipment suffered some flooding and it is reported the freezer did get wet. The electrical panel seems to have stayed dry and looks useable. There are signs of some delamination on both port and starboard hull sides, and a patch on the stbd side. 
The keels, props, and rudders appear visually undamaged and there is no gen set. One A/C, the mast, boom, and rig are missing, and the forward door is broken. Two sails were sighted on board, but not inspected.  
She is a much better yacht than she currently looks. A good cleaning will go a long way with this one! Look closely at the photos and they will tell a story.  *We always encourage potential Buyers to view the item personally or have someone else inspect it for you prior making an offer. It is entirely the buyer's responsibility to inspect and determine the vessel's actual condition.

name: wild
description:
Le Nautitech 47 est un bateau marin et confortable. Ce catamaran de 2005, en version 4 cabines avec 2 pointes avant aménagées, est très bien entretenu par ses propriétaires actuels et possède des équipements récents : moteurs de 2015, GV et génois de 2017, annexe 2017. Visible aux Seychelles. TVA France payée. Inventaire complet sur demande. 
This Nautitech 47 is a seaworthy and comfortable boat. This catamaran of 2005 is a 4-cabins version with 2 peaks. She's well maintained and has recent equipment: engine of 2015, mainsail and genoa of 2017, dinghy of 2017. Visible in Seychelles. VAT France paid. Complete inventory on request.

Il catamarano Lagoon 470 è l’imbarcazione ideale per chi ama il mare e sogna di vivere un’esperienza unica, pur non rinunciando al comfort. Può ospitare comodamente 8 persone in 4 ampie cabine e con una lunghezza complessiva di oltre 47 piedi, il Lagoon 470 offre ampi spazi sia sopra, sia sotto coperta.  BUONE CONDIZIONI + COMMISSIONI DI AGENZIA   INTERNI n. 2 cabine matrimoniali di poppa con bagno privato n. 2 cabine matrimoniali (con letto francese) di prua con bagno privato n. 2 cabine equipaggio con bagno Dinette trasformabile in letto x 2 persone Ampio salone con tavolo da pranzo Cucina attrezzata fornello 3 fuochi, forno, frigorifero, freezer lavastoviglie, lavabiancheria  STRUMENTAZIONE GPS cartografico Raymarine 2015 Radar Tridata Log Eco Stazione vento VHF Autopilota Impianto stereo CD Casse acustiche/stereo esterne Televisore DVD Generatore Paguro 2015 Dissalatore  ARMAMENTO Tavolo esterno in pozzetto Tendalino bimini top Doccia esterna Cuscineria esterna  VELE Randa Genoa avvolgibile Gennaker  MANUTENZIONI: 2015: Manutenzione straordinaria eseguita su motore destro : smontaggio motore, pulizia dello stesso e della sala macchine , spostamento in officina per riparazioni, smontaggio componenti del motore e sostituzione componenti con ricambi originali, sostituzione paroli, rimonaggio e verniciatura motore, tagliando imbarco motore, collaudo, riposizionamento e prova; manutenzione verricello ancora smontaggio, pulizia revisione e rimomtaggio; realizzazione paratia per divisione ancora; revisione winch e stopper, compreso smontaggio, pulizia pezzi in vasca di lavaggio e rimontaggio; rimontaggio pompa iniezione, smontaggio e rimontaggio testa, pulizia e montaggio cassa scambiatore, rimontaggio iniettori, riassemblaggio coppa motore con sigillante; sostituzione piastra evaporatore; Installazione nuovo GPS Raymarine con realizzazione nuovo supporto in legno e verniciatura dello stesso; smontaggio e rimontaggio tamburo rollafiocco, comprensivo di allentamento tensionatura delle sartie; riparazione tamburo comprensivo di nuovi cuscinetti.  2016: Sostituzione silent block motore sx, service approfondito compreso scarico; controllo e sostituzione autoclave sx e carico autoclave sx.  2017: Sostituzione tridata e trasduttore speed, sostituzione batterie e caricabatterie, luci gavoni esterni, luci led quadro, controllo impianti nei bagni, controllo impianto scarico acque nere, sostituzione autoclave scafo dx, controllo raccorderia, eliminazione perdite, controllo valvole termostatiche scaldabagni; smontaggio scambiatore pulizia e rimontaggio; sostituzione eliche e tagliacime; carenaggio completo, sostituzione piastre zinchi; controllo di tutte le prese a mare e sostituzione di 4 prese a mare bloccate, installazione di due nuovi strumenti e realizzazione rete seatalk. 
Note sul prezzo: BUONE CONDIZIONI + COMMISSIONI DI AGENZIA 
English Catamaran Lagoon 470 is the ideal boat for those who love the sea and dreams to live a unique experience, while not renouncing any comforts. Comfortably sleeps 8 people in 4 large cabins with a total length of over 47 feet, Lagoon 470 offers plenty of space both above and below deck.  GOOD CONDITION + INTERNAL AGENCY FEES # 2 aft double cabins with private bathroom # 2 cabins double (French size bed) with private bathroom # 2 crew cabins with bathroom Dinette converts into a bed x 2 people Large living room with dining table Kitchen stove 3 burner stove, oven, refrigerator, freezer, dishwasher, washing machine  INSTRUMENTATION GPS plotter Raymarine 2015 Radar Tridata Log Eco Wind station VHF Autopilot CD stereo External speakers/stereo Tv DVD Paguro 2015 Water maker  ARMAMENT Outdoor table in cockpit Bimini top Outdoor shower Outdoor cushions  SAILS Randa Furling Genoa Gennaker  MAINTENANCE: 2015: maintenance performed on starboard engine: engine disassembly, cleaning and engine room, moving in the workshop for repairs, disassembly of engine components and replacement parts with original spare parts, replacement paroli, rimonaggio and engine painting by cutting boarding motor, testing, replacing and test; maintenance and cleaning dismounting, overhaul anchor winch rimomtaggio; realization bulkhead by Division; revision winch and Stoppers, including disassembly, cleaning and reassembly cleaning tank pieces; injection pump replacement, disassembly and reassembly, cleaning and mounting head crate motor, heat exchanger injector replacement, reassemble Cup with sealant; replacing evaporator plate; Installing new Raymarine GPS with new wooden support and painting; furling drum, including disassembly and reassembly loosening tension of the lines; drum repair including new bearings.  2016: replacing silent block engine sx, service deepened including; checking and replacing load autoclave autoclave sx and sx.  2017: replacing tridata and transducer speed, replacement batteries and Chargers, external storage, lights led lights in bathrooms, control systems, control panel exhaust valve water, replacement autoclave hull dx, control fittings, eliminate leaks, valves control water heaters; Disassembly heat exchanger cleaning and replacement; replacement propellers and tagliacime; complete replacement zinc plates dry dock; control of all sea cocks and replacing frozen sea cocks 4, installation of two new instruments and seatalk network realization. 
Française Catamaran Lagoon 470 est le bateau idéal pour ceux qui aiment la mer et rêve de vivre une expérience unique, tout en ne renonçant ne pas tout confort. Confortablement pour 8 personnes dans 4 grandes cabines avec une longueur totale de plus de 47 pieds, Lagoon 470 offre beaucoup d’espace au-dessus et au-dessous du pont.  BON ÉTAT + FRAIS D’AGENCE INTERNE # 2 arrière cabines doubles avec salle de bains privée # 2 cabines doubles (lit Français) avec salle de bains privée # 2 cabines équipage avec salle de bain Dinette se transforme en un lit x 2 personnes Grand salon avec table à manger Cuisine cuisinière à 3 brûleurs cuisinière, four, réfrigérateur, congélateur, lave-vaisselle, machine à laver  INSTRUMENTATION Traceur GPS Raymarine 2015 Radar Tridata Log Eco Station du vent VHF Pilote automatique Stéréo CD Haut-parleurs externe/stéréo TV DVD Paguro 2015 Dessalinisateur  ARMEMENT Table d’extérieur dans le cockpit Bimini top Douche extérieure Coussins d’extérieurs  LES VOILES Randa Génois Gennaker  ENTRETIEN : 2015 : travaux d’entretien effectués sur le moteur tribord : salle de démontage, nettoyage et moteur, se déplaçant dans l’atelier pour réparation, démontage de composants du moteur et le remplacement des pièces avec des pièces de rechange originales, remplacement de moteur Paroli, rimonaggio et peinture moteur en coupant d’embarquement moteur, essais, remplaçant et essai ; entretien et nettoyage démontage, remise en état d’ancrage treuil rimomtaggio ; cloison de réalisation par Division ; treuil de révision et les bouchons, y compris le démontage, nettoyage et remontage, nettoyage des pièces de réservoir ; remplacement de la pompe injection, de démontage et de remontage, nettoyage et montage injecteur remplacement du échangeur thermique moteur, chef caisse, remonter la coupe avec mastic ; remplacement de plaque d’évaporation ; Installation nouveau GPS Raymarine avec nouveau support en bois et peinture ; enrouleur tambour, y compris le démontage et le remontage en desserrant la tension des lignes ; réparation, y compris les nouveaux roulements du tambour.  2016 : remplacement silent-bloc moteur sx, service approfondi y compris ; vérification et remplacement de chargement autoclave autoclave sx et sx.  2017 : remplaçant tridata et vitesse de transducteur, remplacement des piles et chargeurs, stockage externe, lampes led lumières dans les salles de bains, systèmes de contrôle, panneau de contrôle d’échappement valve eau, remplacement autoclave coque dx, raccords de contrôle, éliminer les fuites, vannes de contrôle chauffe-eau ; Nettoyage des échangeurs de chaleur de démontage et de remplacement ; hélices de remplacement et de tagliacime ; remplacement complet zinc plaques cale sèche ; contrôle de mer tous les coqs et remplaçant la mer gelée coqs 4, installation de deux nouveaux instruments et seatalk réseau réalisation. 
Deutsch Katamaran Lagoon 470 ist das ideale Boot für diejenigen, die das Meer und die Träume, ein einzigartiges Erlebnis, während der Verzicht auf keinen Komfort Leben lieben. Bequem maximal 8 Personen in 4 großen Kabinen mit einer Gesamtlänge von über 47 Fuß, Lagoon 470 bietet viel Platz, sowohl über als auch unter Deck.  GUTEM ZUSTAND + INTERNE VERMITTLUNGSGEBÜHREN # 2 achtern Doppelkabinen mit eigenem Bad # 2 Kabinen Doppelzimmer (französisches Bett) mit eigenem Bad # 2 Crew-Kabinen mit Bad Dinette verwandelt sich in ein Bett 2 Personen Großes Wohnzimmer mit Esstisch Herd 3 Brenner Gasherd, Backofen, Kühlschrank, Gefrierschrank, Geschirrspüler, Waschmaschine  INSTRUMENTIERUNG GPS-Plotter Raymarine 2015 Radar Tridata Log Eco Windstation VHF Autopilot CD-Stereoanlage Externe Lautsprecher/stereo TV DVD PAGURO 2015 Wasser maker  BEWAFFNUNG Outdoor Tisch im cockpit Bimini-top Dusche im freien Outdoor-Kissen  SEGEL Randa Aufrollendes Genua Gennaker  WARTUNG: 2015: Wartungsarbeiten durchgeführt auf Steuerbord Motor: Motor-Demontage, Reinigung und Motor Raum, Bewegung in der Werkstatt für Reparaturen, Demontage von Motorkomponenten und Ersatz Teile mit original-Ersatzteilen, Ersatz Paroli, Rimonaggio und Motor Malerei durch Schneiden, Motor, testen, ersetzen und Test; Wartung und Reinigung, Demontage, Überholung Anker Winde Rimomtaggio; Realisierung-SCHOTT durch Teilung; Revision-Winde und Stopper, einschließlich Demontage, Reinigung und Montage Reinigung Tank Stücke; Einspritzung Pumpe Ersatz, Demontage und Montage, Reinigung und Montage Kopf Kiste motor, Wärmetauscher-Injektor-Ersatz, montieren Cup mit Dichtstoff; Verdampfer-Platte zu ersetzen; Raymarine GPS installieren mit neuen Holzstütze und Malerei neu; furling Trommel, einschließlich Demontage und Montage lösen Verspannungen der Linien; Trommel Reparatur einschließlich neue Lager.  2016: ersetzen Silentblock Motor Sx, Dienst vertieft einschließlich; Español Catamaran Lagoon 470 es el barco ideal para los amantes de la mar y sueños para vivir una experiencia única, al no renunciar a ninguna comodidad. Cómodamente, capacidad 8 personas en 4 cabinas grandes con una longitud total de más de 47 pies, Laguna 470 ofrece un montón de espacio encima y debajo de la cubierta.  BUEN ESTADO + HONORARIOS DE AGENCIA INTERNA # 2 popa doble cabinas con baño privado # Cabañas 2 doble (Francés cama) con baño privado # 2 camarotes de tripulación con baño Comedor se convierte en una cama x 2 personas Amplio living comedor con mesa de comedor Cocina anafe de 3 hornallas, horno microondas, frigorífico, congelador, lavavajillas, lavadora  INSTRUMENTACIÓN Plotter GPS Raymarine 2015 Radar Tridata registro Eco Estación de viento VHF Piloto automático Estéreo CD Altavoces externo/estéreo TV DVD PAGURO 2015 Fabricante de agua  ARMAMENTO Mesa al aire libre en cabina Bimini top Ducha al aire libre Cojines al aire libre  VELAS Randa Enrollador de Génova Gennaker  MANTENIMIENTO: 2015: mantenimiento realizado en el motor de estribor: sala de desmontaje, limpieza y motor, movimiento en el taller para reparaciones, desmontaje de componentes de motor y reemplazo de partes con repuestos originales, reemplazo del motor Paroli, rimonaggio y pintura de motor mediante la reducción de embarque motor, pruebas, reemplazo y prueba; mantenimiento y limpieza desmontaje, revisión rimomtaggio de cabrestante de ancla; tabique hermético de realización por división; torno de la revisión y tapones, incluyendo el desmontaje, limpieza y montaje limpieza piezas del tanque; recambio de bomba de inyección, desmontaje y montaje, limpieza y montaje cajón cabeza motor, intercambiador de calor del inyector reemplazo, vuelva a la Copa con sellador; sustituir la placa del evaporador; Instalar nuevo GPS Raymarine con nuevo soporte para madera y pintura; enrollador de tambor, incluyendo desmontaje y remontaje aflojando la tensión de las líneas; tambor de reparación incluyendo nuevos cojinetes.  2016: sustituir el silent-block motor sx, servicio profundizado incluyendo; comprobación y sustitución de cargan de autoclave autoclave sx y sx.  2017: reemplazar tridata y transductor velocidad, pilas y cargadores, almacenamiento externo, luces led luces en baños, sistemas de control, control panel escape válvula de agua, recambio autoclave casco dx, accesorios de control, eliminar fugas, válvulas de controlan de calentadores de agua; Limpieza de intercambiadores de calor de desmontaje y reemplazo; hélices de repuesto y tagliacime; reemplazo completo zinc placas dique seco; control del mar todas pollas y sustitución de grifos de mar congelado 4, instalación de dos nuevos instrumentos y seatalk red realización. 
Россию Катамаран Lagoon 470 является идеальная лодка для тех, кто любит море и мечты жить уникальный опыт, при этом не отказывается от каких-либо удобств. Спокойно спит 8 человек в 4 каютах большой общей протяженностью свыше 47 футов, Лагуна 470 предлагает много места, как выше, так и под палубой.  ХОРОШЕМ СОСТОЯНИИ + ВНУТРЕННИЕ АГЕНСТВА # 2 кормовой двойные каюты с собственной ванной комнатой # 2 двойными кабинами (французская кровать) с ванной комнатой # 2 каюты экипажа с ванной комнатой Dinette преобразует в постели x 2 людей Большая гостиная с обеденным столом Кухонные плиты 3 горелки печи, печь, Холодильник, морозильник, Посудомоечная машина, Стиральная машина  ПРИБОРОСТРОЕНИЕ GPS плоттера Raymarine 2015 Радар Tridata журнал Эко Ветер станция ОВЧ Автопилот CD стерео Внешние динамики/стерео Телевизор DVD Paguro 2015 Чайник для воды  ВООРУЖЕНИЕ Открытый стол в кокпите Бимини Душ на открытом воздухе Диванные подушки  ПАРУСА Ранда Закрутки Генуя Генакер  ТЕХНИЧЕСКОЕ ОБСЛУЖИВАНИЕ: 2015: обслуживание выполняется на правого двигателя: двигатель разборка, очистка и двигатель номер, движущихся в мастерской для ремонта, Разборка двигателя компонентов и замена частей с оригинальных запасных частей, замена Paroli, rimonaggio и двигатель картина путем разрезания интернат мотор, тестирования, замены и испытания; техническое обслуживание и очистка демонтаж, ремонт якорных лебедок rimomtaggio; Переборка реализации Отделом; Редакция лебедки и пробки, включая разборка, очистка и сборка очистка танк штук; замена насоса инъекций, Разборка и сборка, очистка и монтаж головки ящик мотор, теплообменник форсунки замена, соберите Кубок с герметиком; Замена пластины испарителя; Установка новых Raymarine GPS с новой деревянной поддержки и живописи; закрутки барабан, включая Разборка и сборка, ослабление напряженности линий; Ремонт барабана, включая новые подшипники.  2016: замена немого блок двигателя sx, услуг углубило включая; Проверка и замена загрузки автоклав автоклав sx и sx.  2017: замена tridata и датчика скорости, замена батареи и Зарядные устройства, внешние накопители, лампы Светодиодные фонари в ванных, систем управления, панель управления выхлопной клапан воды, замена автоклава Халл dx, управления арматура, устранение утечек, клапаны управления нагреватели воды; Разборка теплообменника чистки и замены; Замена двигателей и tagliacime; полная замена цинковых пластин сухой док; контроль всех моря петухов и замена замороженные море петухов 4, установка двух новых инструментов и seatalk сети реализации.

name: cayali
description:
Le Nautitech 47 est un bateau marin et confortable. Ce modèle de 2005, en version 4 cabines avec 2 pointes avant aménagées, est très bien entretenu par ses propriétaires actuels et possède des équipements récents : moteur de 2012, GV et génois de 2016, réfrigérateur et conservateur de 2016, literie et robinetterie des salles de bain neufs, annexe 2016,… Visible au Marin en Martinique. TVA Martinique payée, Octroi de mer payé. Inventaire complet sur demande.
This Nautitech 47 is a seaworthy and comfortable boat. This unity of 2005 is a 4-cabins version with 2 peaks converted into a single berth. She’s well maintained and has recent equipment: engine of 2012, mainsail and genoa of 2016, refrigerator and freezer of 2016, new bedding and taps in heads, dinghy of 2016… Lying in Le Marin Martinique. VAT Martinique paid, local taxes paid. Complete inventory on request.

Le Nautitech 47 est un très élégant voilier de voyage. Cette unité est en bon état et entretenu régulièrement par un professionnel. Une première révision complète a été faite en 2013 notamment park batteries, un renforcement des bossoirs,verrins et cables de barre neufs,les cabines avant ont été repeintes, ,les haubans sont remplacés rail de grand voile Harken. En 2015 remplacement des 2 moteurs. En 2107 remplacement de tout l'électronique, des voiles , de la selleries ext / int, des panneaux de pont, de l'annexe .... Dernier carénage DECEMBRE 2017. Très beau bateau prêt à partir.

name: kokoumdo
description:
Great looking Nautitech 475 that I inspected last week. Well maintained and clean. I have numerous photos I can provide to interested parties.
Very taught lines, sleek coach roof: one of the most elegant cats ever designed. A long waterline guaranties that you are on a real yacht whose seaworthiness is beyond reproach. Its thin hulls disguise an impressive amount of interior space; the cockpit and saloon being on the same level. What is most impressive when you climb aboard for the first time is the huge saloon looking to the exterior, its U-shaped and spacious galley and the panoramic view. It is certainly one of the finest catamarans on the market. Built in La Rochelle, it has been the subject of constant improvement. Equipped with 4 double cabins and 2 fore peaks which can be fitted out, allowing berths for 12 people.
Motivated seller.

Roberston & Caine Leopard 47 built in 2003 as 2004 model year.  
The Leopard 47 is the best combination of space, performance, quality and value. Built in Cape Town, South Africa and outfitted with US equipment, including complete electronics, generator and air conditioning. The Leopard 47 features a galley up, private and spacious heads, an aft platform with direct easy access to the cockpit, and great performance under power and sail.  
This privately owned Leopard 47 is professionally maintained to a great standard. It is the 4 cabin 4 heads version, which sleeps 8 guests in cabins and a further 2 guests in the saloon. 
Owners comments: 
Supreme comfort and exceptional inside volume. Has all the desired high sea features, including great performance and solid construction. Easy handling and top performance and an immense cockpit for relaxing and entertaining. Fully maintained – no expense spared, privately owned.

name: tarsha
description:
Leopard 4700 Catamaran 2001 Tarsha
This superb Leopard 4700 catamaran available for charter with Horizon Yacht Charters Grenada comes from the designers Robertson & Caine and was previously named Cruising World‘s “Best Charter Boat of the Year”.
Her well thought out interior layout provides for four spacious and private double berth staterooms, each with ensuite shower and head. The open plan galley is set out in the bridge deck and comes well equipped with a microwave oven, Force 10 four burner stove, mechanical refrigeration system providing excellent cooling to the freezer box.
The 12V refrigerator box is separate to minimize the opening of the freezer. There are ample work surfaces allowing for uncluttered food preparation. The main saloon is kitted out with an AM/FM and CD player. A large folding dining table with a u-shaped settee provides a comfortable seating arrangement.
Above decks, the wide transom and aft deck offer easy access to the huge cockpit. There is ample space under the shade of a full bimini to seat all guests. Convenient access to the water is provided from the aft deck. The rig geometry for this yacht allows for ease of handing without compromising performance.

47 Nautitech 475 catamaran buit in France by Dufour Yacht. Features: 4 cabin, 4 head layout.  Twin Volvo D2-55 Saildrive (2007),  FB mainsail and self-tacking genoa (2007),spinnaker,  standing rigging replaced (2007). Bimini top with side curtains, port helm station bimini top,  SS davits, Profurl roller furling, Raymarine radar, Raymarine autopilot(2017), Raymarine wind, deep and speed instruments, VHF and SSB radio. (2) electric windlass, Espar diesel cabin heater, 2500 watts inverter, (10) 6 volts batteries for service, (2) 12 volts batteries for engine. Coast Guard safety equipments for 24 passengers, epoxy bottom (2011). This beatiful catamaran have been used for for private day charter and sailing school in Quebec city. Very clean, mostly used in fresh water. Canadian duty paid, located Quebec Harbor Marina. Owner willing to deliver East coast or Great Lake. For more information, please contact broker.

name: kilkenny kats
description:
"KILKENNY KATS" From South Africa, the Leopard 47 cruising cat offers sumptuous accommodations combined with fine sailing characteristics and on-the-level cruising. 
A bright and airy interior, offering plenty of room for eight guests to spread out and enjoy all the islands in air conditioned comfort. 
Four large double cabins each have their own en suite bathroom with extra sleeping space as the dinette easily converts to a double berth. The galley is easy to move around in, has lots of counter space and top of the range appliances. Easy to sail, roomy and ready for your outdoor Caribbean lifestyle. 
A good, solid boat lying in the waters of Grenada and the Grenadines.

name: baju
description: Robust and performant catamaran. Easy to maintain. Perfect for an offshore program or a life aboard in the lagoon.

The deal blend of comfort,  performance, and user friendliness! 
The Beneteau Oceanis 46 is great for weekend cruising as well as capable for crossing oceans. It is easy to handle and it has an uncluttered view across the deck from the helm which is crucial for close-quarter maneuvering.  
The cockpit features twin wheels which is great for comfort under sail and visibility forward.  All sail control lines are led aft to the cockpit. The chart plotter is mounted aft at the end of the cockpit table which makes it easy for viewing by the helmsman.  
The forward cabin features an island-style queen size bed, dressing table and ensuite head. Two identical guest cabins are located aft. The roomy 2nd head is located conveniently at the bottom of the stairs to starboard and features a separate shower. 
The U-shape galley is to port of the companionway - which is really handy under way or entertaining.  
There is a U-shaped settee draped around a handsome table to port with two seats on the centerline. The settee to starboard includes a removable armrest, allowing it to become a sea berth. The large portlights are covered with pleated blinds and the overhead hatches have sliding shades. 
The hull is hand-laid fiberglass without a core and incorporates a molded structural grid or liner. A vinylester barrier coat helps prevent blisters. The deck is cored except under high-load areas where it is solid, beefed-up laminate. The main bulkheads are bonded through 360 degrees, providing torsional and compression strength. 
****Comprehensive Yacht Condition Index Report available to serious buyers***

name: certitude
description: This particular Bahia has been owned by its current owner for over 10 years and has spent its time cruising the Caribbean Islands, in that time the owner has made modifications over and above a standard Bahia which make sailing and living aboard easier and more comfortable. Its 3 electric winches make light work many of the jobs on deck including the sails. It has a large custom 11 CU freezer in the galley provides impressive frozen storage. Extra house batteries give ample power storage, and 2 large solar panels and 2 wind generators keep up with most power demand onboard. The vessel has 2 power inverters fitted to help keep the power usage on board efficient, a smaller one handles low demand items such as keeping phones and computers charged, and a larger one for the higher power demand items such as toasters, coffee makers or hair dryers and can be turned on as needed. A Northern Lights generator located in the Port engine compartment provides air conditioning via 3 Air conditioning units and also provides battery charging. 4 Bilge pumps with alarms keep you notified of any water in the bilge and the system also indicates which pump has activated. The crew bunk beds in the port and starboard companion-way have been converted into useful storage and also accommodate the water maker. The current owner has converted the Starboard forward cabin to a workshop and storage which is very useful if you plan to live aboard but could also be converted back into a cabin if the new owners prefer to have a 4th Cabin. The owner’s bathroom features an electric toilet and stand up shower. The boat comes with an impressive number of tools and spares included.
Robust and performant catamaran. Sixteenth copies, easy to maintain. Perfect for an offshore program or a life aboard in the lagoon.

Catamaran, acheté neuf convoyé par mer et entretenu par le personnel technique de Tahiti Yacht Charter, il a toujours navigué dans les archipels de la Polynésie Française essentiellement dans les lagons des îles sous le vent. 
Livrable à la base de Tahiti Yacht Charter, à Raiatea. 
Ce bateau est francisé à Papeete

name: aqila
description:
Here's a bit late model sail cat at a budget price. Where can you get a 2013 Cat, 46' for under $300k? 
- 2013 GRP Cat, 46' (14 m) - 2 Bedroom layout - Aft elevated drive station with weather protected seating for 3 - Adjustable drivers seat - 2015 sails - Galley up design - Big foredeck - Large lounge - Dinghy & davits - Full cockpit covers - Economical and powerful Mercury 4-Stroke 50 HP outboards 
Great value here in a coastal cruiser or live-aboard.

This well-kept Bahia 46 is on permanent vacation in the South Pacific.  She is currently in Fiji with an eye towards Tonga in the not-to-distant future.  Her Seattle-based owners want to keep her in the South Pacific for a few more years and seek a 50% partner so that she can be enjoyed year-round.  She has all of the toys to properly unwind and enjoy extended vacations in paradise.  This is a great lifestyle opportunity!  Her current owners primarily use her October-May and are looking for a good fit for use and compatible personalities for partnership.  The Sellers own her outright and have a recent survey to share.  She is in good condition.  There are only 3 years on the sails and she has fresh bottom paint, a new watermaker, updated dive compressor, rebuilt saildrives, and a new helm seat being installed now.  Owners keep her maintenance up to date and usually spend about $10-20k annually on maintenance/upgrades/repair.  China Cat Sunflower is Malaysian flagged.  If this opportunity is your ticket to the South Pacific, contact Matthew Dunning today and let him know a bit about yourself and your sailing life.  Compatibility is key in partnerships.

name: reva reva
description:
The right boat in the right location! 
Reva Reva is a four cabin model of the highly respected Fountaine Pajot Bahia 46 launched in 2006. The Bahia 46 is still considered Fountaine Pajot’s masterpiece crafted by her designers Joubert Nivelt and Olivier Flahault. She features excellent performance under sail, a spacious cockpit area and a clean, easy to move around deck. Built for blue-water cruising, the Bahia 46 remains extremely easy to single-hand with hundreds of couples cruising the world aboard the same model. 
Inside, a breakfast bar separates the comfortable saloon and chart table, offering great visibility for those longer or overnight passages. Reva Reva’s fourcabins are well-appointed, spacious and each offers its own private bathroom. 
  
This is the best value for money Bahia 46 on the market, allowing you to take advantage of great local service and the dream location to commence your cruising life. Reva Reva has an in-depth maintenance record by a dedicated technical team, and all items on board have been looked after by the company including the engines servicing, sails and canvas which have now been winterized. 
Multihull Solutions has built a partnership with a major charter company based in Tahiti, enabling us to offer good quality production model catamarans for sale under attractive conditions. Multihull Solutions performs a comprehensive inspection on the boats in Tahiti before presenting them to the market. Furthermore, being the official agent for Fountaine Pajot in the Asia Pacific, we can offer assistance worldwide. 
  
It would be ideal if you considered taking delivery of this model in French Polynesia, where you will be assisted by the professional team on site, helping you with any questions, even providing skipper or crew whenever required. This is the dream location for any cruising boat and she is already there! Hundreds of sheltered islands, pristine waters, astonishing sea life and unequalled welcoming traditions by the locals. Some boats never leave the region…yet from there on it is pretty much downwind all the way to Australia or New Zealand with more incredible destinations on the way: Tonga, Fiji, Vanuatu…Now is the good time with the cyclone season over. 
Talk to our team about delivery to your home port in Australia for under $440,000 AUD (Approximate price including shipping, tax and duty. Subject to exchange rate at the time of purchase.)

name: the classic
description: World Wide Boat Brokers proudly brings to the market, a great, yet rare to find Lagoon 47 sailing cat from the early classic designs and one of the last 3 cabin owner's version ever built. She has all the creature comforts and much of the high gloss rounded teak joinery that was the epitome of all vessels of that era. Aptly named "The Classic" she is in remarkably exceptional condition, set up for blue water cruising, she is already a testament of her capabilities by the many sea miles travelled and history of the many celebrities that have been on board. She is easily manageable for shorthanded sailing with dual helm stations, and in-boom furling battened mainsail. Ready for cruising with a long list of extras:o Rare 3 cabin owner's versiono Antifouled (April 2018)o Engines serviced (May 2018)o Upgraded Raymarine Electronics (May 2018)o In-boom hydraulic furling mainsailo Gen Set ONAN 7KWo Ducted reverse cycle air cono Water Maker Spectra 12V 30LPHo Wind Generatoro Euromaid 5.5kg Front Loader Washing machineo 840AH House Bank (new 2016)o Solar Panels 550W totalo Sat phone Iridium GOo Caribe RIB with 15hp O/Bo PLUS Water Toyso PLUS so much more

name: simba
description: Privately owned from new.  3 cab/3 head Maestro model.  Very well equipped and maintained by meticulous owner.  Viewing highly recommended.

Dalila is from 2001 and initially destined for the luxury charter market in French Polynesia.  She is still professionally used and is well suited to this or to a bigger family. The boats structure, sails, rigging and electronics are in good condition, but a buyer should plan to replace the engines.  While still running well, they have served over many years.  The excellent price for this boat takes into account this consideration. 
  
Dalila est un exemplaire de l’année 2001 initialement destiné au charter de luxe en Polynésie, toujours adapté à une activité professionnelle ou à la vie à bord en famille. La structure, les voiles, le gréement et l’électronique sont en bon état mais il faudra prévoir de remplacer à terme les moteurs. Son prix qui tient compte de ces éléments est extrêmement attractif. Une affaire à saisir rapidement !

name: rampager
description:
1995 Gross Fastback 43. 
Australian registered, one-owner John Gross designed sailing cat with transoms extended to 46’. 
Get there fast then take it slow. KISS – keep it simple, sailor – means spend your time enjoying the destination, not repairing systems! With a single daggerboard, single Yanmar with raiseable saildrive leg, and 2 queen cabins with their own heads, this vessel brings all the benefits of a sailing cat with none of the drawbacks –stable platform, flat, fast sailing, huge social cockpit, shallow draft, and the space for comfortable live-aboard/extended cruising without complex system repair and maintenance. 
Extensively cruised to the Kimberly, Whitsundays and other Australian destinations with full cockpit enclosure, large tanks,battery bank, solar, wind gen, genset and watermaker, this light, fast cat has proved herself easy to handle short handed. The single Yanmar reduces mechanical maintenance overhead, and the saildrive raises to reduce drag underway, minimise underwater entanglement/strike threat, and reduces maintenance by lifting clear of the water. In conjunction with her solid GRP hulls, daggerboard and kick-up rudders this also enables her to take the ground safely. 
2 cabin 2 head layout also enables a large workable galley, workshop area and plenty of stowage, with a forward deck lounging area providing a safe, social alternative to the cockpit or saloon, as well as excellent stowage for surfboards, kayaks, SUPs, etc. 
• 0.7m draft • Raiseable saildrive leg • Kick-up rudders • Watermaker • 600AH battery bank • 450W solar, 400W wind gen, and Honda EU20i genset • Huge saloon and vast galley • Workshop area • Dinghy with 2 outboards: Yamaha 3hp and Tohatsu 8hp • Electric dinghydavit winch 
This comprehensively equipped, one owner vesselhits all the marks and she’s ready to go again – a very affordable, comfortable cruising cat with ample space and plenty of storage. Just bring your suitcase and plenty of sunscreen.

One of the well known and highly respected Fastback 43s, she was launched in Western Australian by its current and original owner. She has cruised extensively and performs beautifully under sail with the ability to raise the drive leg. This also allows her to take the bottom when combined with her dagger board, kick up rudders and solid GRP hulls. One of the delightful features of this design is the forward deck lounge area, as well as a secure and safe place to sit it provides an excellent stowage space for surfboards and similar watercraft. She has two large Queen berths each with their own toilet and shower, a large well laid out galley, extensive storage space and a workshop area. 
She represents exceptional value for money and is a genuine step aboard and cruise away proposition.

name: ocean dreams
description:
"Odie" has been retired from the charter fleet in Bocas del Torro 
She will need recommissioning  and quite a bit of cosmetic redoing.and this is reflected in the price. 
She is essentially a term charter vessel with facilities for ten guest and two crew and has the basic systems to support the crew and guests for a week charter at a time.  
PICTURES FROM #12 ONWARDS TAKEN DECEMBER 2017

With four staterooms, each with en suite head and shower, spacious and comfortable saloon which can seat 8, large topload fridge/freezer and front load stainless steel door fridge this Catamaran is very comfortable for cruising with a large number of peolpe. The upgraded cockpit with fibreglass hardtop offers comfort in the cockpit and an easy platform for the solar panels and attending the mainsail. 
As a stable sailing platform it is well designed to make comfortable passages. Powered by twin Yanmar 50HP diesel engines gives support to get home in any weather conditions.

A true blue water cruising catamaran with proven passage making and respected French stout construction. Refit 2006 with super reliable Yanmar's with one new engine and one original from 1992. Rare find, Health forces sale. Asking price is approximate from Thai baht.

name: come beck
description: Latest classic Gérard DANSON design, the OUTREMER bestseller is - of course - the OUTREMER 45 (before the arrival of the new generation: New 45, 49, 51 et 5X). Built since 2002, the Outremer 45 keeps all the advantages of a fast, simple and safe blue water cruising catamaran. Daggerboards for best performance up wind, without drag for down wind surfs and in storm conditions. Ideal for single hand operation, simple efficient layout, the Outremer 45 represents the ideal performance cruising cat to discover the oceans, appreciated by blue water cruisers and regatta crews. - 1st place  Mallorca MC-Cup- 1st place  Turkey MC-Cup- 1st place  Outremer Cup in La Grande Motte

name: spirit of michaelmas
description: Spirit Of Michaelmas is a one owner from new, very comfortable Cruising vessel for a family with all the comforts of home. The vessel is easy to operate and in fact can be sailed single handed very effectively. The vessel is also extremely well set out  and perfectly suited for Day Charters and Sun Set Cruise’s. The vessel has been well maintained and many upgrades have been carried out in recent years.

Lagoon 440 catamaran is a revolutionary design! 
Below deck, you have all the privacy you need with 4 cabins and 4 heads, along with two smaller cabins for occasional guest use or skipper. All the beds in the main cabins are large, with island beds in the aft cabins. You can also enjoy a great view from your bed through the huge one-way windows. 
Replacements in 2018: Boom & Spare parts, Sail cover, Mainsail, Stack Pack, Sail Drive parts, Propellers, VHF Antenna, Wind sensor, Digital Multipurpose Display, VHF, GPS chart plotter, Halyards, Inventory gear, Outboard engine, Dinghy, 3 bases Stanchions, 4 lifelines, 2 Pulpits wooden seats, Stern light, Handrail stb seat on Fly bridge, 12 V cockpit Fridge, Stove, Sliding door entrance lock, 2 AC remote controls, El. Panel, 1 Mirror, El. Switches and outlets, 2 Fridge locks, Bimini, Cockpit shower, Inventory gear, new upholstery. 
Repairs in 2018: Sail Drive, Trampoline, Celling fwd cabin, Cleanings 
EXTERNAL WORK 2018: GRP repairs, Hull Polish, Stainless steel repairs, Rigging and furling Genoa repairs; service of engine an generator, antifouling!

name: alize
description:
LIVE SKYPE VIDEO TOUR OF THIS YACHT AVAILABLE ON REQUEST 
  
The Lagoon 440 was voted "Best Charter Catamaran 2005" by Cruising World Magazine and has proved to be one of the most popular and successful charter and cruising cats of all time. 
The upper flybridge gives excellent all round visibility and with all lines led back to this position the boat can be sailed single handed! An electric halyard winch means easy hoisting for the powerful roached mainsail. A raymarine chart plotter and all instruments are close to hand. Alternatively the boat can be controlled under power using a joy stick at the navigation station in the saloon and switch over engine controls. 
The vast, solid covered cockpit will seat 10 – Alize has a specially made GRP table for this purpose. The cockpit also contains an outside sink and fridge under for drinks storage. Under the seat is the massive 11KVA generator that supplies sufficient power for all the AC sets. 
From the cockpit a large sliding door opens to the saloon – again spacious seating with an L shaped settee and centre seat which also gives additional storage area for the galley. The galley has a stainless steel counter top with convenient access to the cockpit through a sliding hatch. A 3 burner stove, oven, microwave and stainless steel freezer and fridge units (new 2008) complete a very well equipped galley. The saloon has its own 16,000 BTU AC unit. 
There are 4 well-appointed double cabins with plentiful hanging and storage space. The cabins are located in each aft and forward hull and each cabin is served with its own spacious shower and head. Each cabin has individually controlled air-conditioning unit. There is one additional crew cabin in the forward section of the port hull with its own head in the starboard hull. 
Each engine is accessed through its own hatch forward of the stern steps. Yanmar 50hp diesels with SD50 drive units and 3 bladed props give the boat great power. 
During the course of her management with Horizon Yacht Charters, Alize has seen many upgrades and revisions. An upgraded charging system with increased battery capacity (over 1,000Ah), deep cycle batteries (replaced 2012), high output alternators with external regulators, upgraded wiring and a 140A battery charger (for shore power or generator) have all been installed. A new mainsail was fitted in 2011 and the stackpack modified to make easier to zip up after use. All through hull fittings were replaced on 2010/ 11. New dinghy Oct 2013. The boat was re-rigged in Nov 2013. New outboard March 2014. Alize has been very carefully maintained in Horizon’s care since 2008 – full service records are available. 
Oct 2014. Hull entirely stripped of antifouling, Interprotect epoxy barrier coat applied before applying new antifouling. Both sail drive diaphragms changed.

Completely renewed in 2017: 
New sails, new propellers, new all batteries on board, renewed galley interior, new air condition pump, new engine panel, new stove, new engine starter! 
Lagoon 440 catamaran is a revolutionary design, offering three large outdoor areas to relax in. Your skipper and crew can work the boat from the raised steering position on the fly bridge and other crew members can choose between joining the skipper on the raised cockpit, relaxing in the aft cockpit or dozing in the trampoline across the bows. 
Below deck, you and your crew have all the privacy you need with 4 cabins and 4 heads, along with two smaller cabins for occasional guest use or skipper. All the beds in the main cabins are large, with island beds in the aft cabins. You can also enjoy a great view from your bed through the huge one-way windows.

She has been very well taken care of by her current owner who has become too involved with his new projects. 
Local taxes are paid and there is a possibility of storage. 
More info including condition report is available upon enquiry.

Maxi-Nique ll is a 2005 Knysna 440 blue water voyaging catamaran. Her owners have sailed her to the Caribbean from South Africa and lived on her comfortably for the past several years. She is ideal for a couple or family to live on and sail safely almost anywhere in the world. Her construction is robust and she has a full compliment of safety equipment, SSB Radio, 1,000 Watts of solar panels, etc. Please see the full specs listing here to get a better sense of her full inventory.  
These boats are faster sailors than the French production cats, and much more hand crafted, a bit more blue water in orientation, although they are comfortable for charter.  
If you have less than $300,000 to spend and are looking for a turn-key cruising catamaran, Maxi-Nique ll should be on your short list for sure. To learn more about her, just give us a call. Showings can be organized in Puerto Rico with just a few days of advance notice as her owners continue to live on her.

name: x ta sea
description:
X Ta Sea, an Easy 43 Catamaran, launched in 2012. Beautifully built and by far the biggest Easy to date, with a spacious saloon with large lounge and table for easy entertaining. 
2 Queen sized cabins provide comfortable sleeping accommodation with ample headroom, storage and hanging space. The starboard owners cabin has an island queen size bed that runs East West and is large and airy with plenty of room around the bed. A spacious head and separate shower as well as a twin tub washer completes the wet area. 
The port hull accommodates guests or family members with a queen size bed and a single forward berth. 
Port side the galley down has ample storage and is well equipped with wall oven, microwave, separate freezer and upright refrigerator. Compared to other 13m catamarans she is still quite light but provides the space and carrying capacity for extended cruising. 
Plenty of seating in the cockpit, easy access to all working lines and excellent visibility. 
She is fitted with Twin Volvo 30 HP Diesel engines and Raymarine electronics making this Cat an exceptional cruising yacht. 
X Ta Sea is a fabulous boat and the finishing touches superb. 
Conveniently located at The Boatworks, out of water and ready for inspection and survey. 
X Ta Sea is undoubtedly the best Easy 43 to be seen.

name: free spirit
description:
This high-tec performance cruising cat has a superb pedigree, she was built by the famous Australian Multihull identity Geoff Cruse who is known for his range of Crowther Windspeed catamarans he built back in the 80’s and 90’s, his pioneering sailing and building of Multis in the early 70’s and in recent times as Australia’s leading Multihull expert and surveyor. 
Free Spirit has been built in foam wrapped in lovely yellow Kevlar and sealed and bonded in the best epoxy resin. This makes the boat very light and incredibly strong, the mast is a beautiful work of art in carbon fibre. 
Free Spirit is a big cat with a wide beam for stability and room below for family and friends, she has 2 x big double cabins, galley down in the starboard hull, plenty of fridge space. 
She has done plenty of cruising to some of the more remote outer reefs of the Queensland coast as well as a number of Brisbane to Gladstone yacht races and has been a popular fun boat doing the casual WAGS race at RQYS in Moreton Bay and plenty of fun nights on board at the many cruising location within Moreton Bay. 
The builder Geoff (Crusey) Cruse has always been the one who’s in charge of doing all the maintenance on her over the years. 
It comes with a huge wardrobe of cruising and exotic racing sails. 
Don’t be fooled into thinking this is just a race machine, it’s an incredibly capable cruiser that can kick up her heels and average sparkling sea mile. Her Sister ship “Bligh Spirit” completed a cruising circumnavigation of the globe with a crew of 2. 
Don’t miss this opportunity to invest in this fun life style of a quality fast cruiser and racer at a bargain price. She is ready to sail away over the horizon.
Charter boat in good conditions

name: ventenar
description: Owner version Belize 43's are highly sought after, and we are really excited to list Ventenar for sale. We sold her to her current owner several years ago, and since that time he has continually upgraded this yacht. Please call us to organize a showing, or if you have any specific questions.

name: antares
description:
PRICE JUST REDUCED SELL NOW ! 
   
This boat shows very well! 
Ready to go cruising! 
Low engine hours 
BRAND NEW SAILS, Sail covers and sheet lines 
NEW BOTTOM PAINT 
SAIL-DRIVE SERVICE including new zincs and 'PROP SPEED' 
Two NEW RAYMARINE PLOTTERS (Inside and Out) 
High-output water maker with 12v backup 
Solar panels and Wind generator 
Raymarine electronics including Autopilot, Radar, and AIS receiverIcom SSB with Pactor modemHard-top and archOnly two owners since new. 
The Voyage line of catamarans is renowned for double digit speed, innovative design features, head-turning good looks, and a build quality that it second to none. Designed by Alexander Simonis, this South African-built Sail Cat was built for both performance and comfort.  
ANTARES was launched in January 2001 and was the very last Voyage 43 built.  Therefore, it has some of the features of the new Voyage 44 which superseded it in the production line.   
This particular NORSEMAN 43 was built with a unique "hybrid" layout that has 4 staterooms to accommodate a large owner's party, but instead of the usual 4 head compartments found on a Cat with a 'charter layout' it has just TWO head compartments with showers located midships; one in each hull.  Thus the layout is very open and roomy with out crowding the interior with the 'extra' 2 heads.  Also, the 2 head compartments are much larger than those found on a Cat which has the conventional 'Charter Layout'.    
Therefore, there are essentially two equal "Owner's Staterooms" located aft in BOTH the Port and Starboard hulls. 
The equipment list includes solar panels, water-maker, cruise electronics, dinghy w/outboard, electric anchor windlass, and Harken roller furling. The solar panels provide plenty of power to keep the refrigeration systems cold while underway or at anchor. 
ANTARES was delivered NEW to the original owners, a German couple who then crossed the South Atlantic to Brazil and on up to explore the northern coast of South America, Panama and Central America, and most of the island nations of the Caribbean.   
This vessel is very well-equipped for cruising and living aboard, and the 3.2 ft draft makes it ideal for Florida and Bahama cruising.  
As a used vessel ANTARES is in very nice condition!  It has just been detailed inside and out, and the vessel has been left with us for an immediate sale.  
ANTARES has never been chartered and is set up for extended live aboard cruising and extended living aboard "on the hook".  
  
If you are looking for a reasonably-priced, well-equipped and nicely-maintained "go anywhere" Sail Catamaran...your boat has arrived !

name: rataplan
description:
NEW PRICE DROP - OWNER WANTS IT SOLD 
The Crowther is named after the legendary Australian boat designer and builder Lock Crowther.  His first boat was a trimaran built in 1959 while he was still a teenager.  Over 2500 boats were built using his various designs.  After his death in 1993, his son took over the business, which is when this vessel was built.  Crowther Cats are know for applying innovative materials at the time, like GRP-foam sandwich construction, and concepts like wave piercing bows. 
Originally this design was a 40ft catamaran, and then in 1997 they launched an extended version by adding 3ft to the stern, with a comfortable swim platform. 
Delivery in Puerto Montt or Lima, Peru. Other options can be negotiated.

name: odyssey
description:
Layout is 4 cabin layout, 2 head layout. Galley-up design. Built to US specifications from the factory for a very experienced cruiser. One owner yacht since new. Hull sanded and new bottom paint Dec 2017 and full sail-drive service and seals.  
Surveyor report including out of water bottom inspection available for review by qualified buyers.The Privilege 435, introduced in 1999 to replace the Privilege 42, continues the evolution in the Privilege line to meet the shift of opportunities in the market. This custom hull laid with longer waterline mold to accommodate the 40 horsepower engines and anticipated extra mechanical equipment. This mold eventually became the 445 model. Most major suppliers to the charter industry in recent years have found it beneficial to tailor their products increasingly temptingly to the discerning private owner. Following this trend, the design of the 435 incorporates measures to get better performance (without compromising the luxury level). These enhancements include lighter displacement gained through a more highly optimized hull structure.

name: glory days
description:
The Voyage line of catamarans is renowned for their double digit speed, innovative design features, head-turning good looks , and build quality that it second to none. Designed by Alexander Simonis, this South African built cat was built for both performance and comfort. This never-chartered owner's version Voyage 430 is set up for extended live aboard and cruising on the hook. Self sufficient in every way, she will keep her crew happy, comfortable, and safe. The livability of this boat is amazing and storage room is exceptional. She is ready to take your family wherever they want to go. 
GLORY DAYS bright and cheery interior is clean as a whistle and she shows really well, come see for yourself!

description:
The Belize 43 Catamaran has recently been refit, it was one of the most successful models built by Fountaine Pajot. The lightweight, tall rig and large sail area,  make the Belize one of the best performing catamarans in this size range. The owners have commonly experienced speeds in the 8 to 12-knot range. The high bridge deck minimizes wave slapping and makes for a safe and comfortable ride.

These boats were made with foam cored hulls, foam under the two forward berths and poured foam behind the engines.

The owners have spent the last 8 years making extensive improvements, This is a turn key boat, ready to go anywhere your adventures take you.

name: seanna
description:
The Vendor has instructed us to take all cash Offers to him and to sell today!!! AS-IS WHERE-IS. Don't miss this great opportunity! First in with the best Offer. Be in an amazing Perry 43 for Christmas and celebrate the New Year in style! Berthed at Sanctuary Cove, Qld. 
World Wide Boat Brokers would like to present the next hot property, 3 cabin owner's version Perry 43. She has never been chartered and the Volvo engines have less than 800 original hours, recently all serviced August 2018. No expense was spared when she also went through an extensive refit in 2010, costing $150,000. She is now available for sale with a very motivated Vendor at a reduced price to sell. Well worth the look for the value and price now being offered!!!With an exhaustive Inventory here are some key features worth mentioning:o Seanna is the Owners version, she has 3 bedrooms (1x Double, 2x Queen size) Both of the Queen size Mattresses are "Enviro Foam" in as new condition. o 2 Bathrooms each have their own toilet and vanity. There is a huge shower in the main bathroom and the other is the ensuite off the owner's cabin. o Brand new (Nov 2016) 60L hot water system still under warranty. o 9KVA Lomardini Genset, you will never be starved for power at sea or anchorage. o Washing Machine and Dryer housed in their own cabin with a sound proof door. o 2 Reverse cycle Air conditioners, one for each hull, both are also ducted into the Saloon. o Both of the 40hp Volvo Penta MD20240 diesel engines have been serviced recently. Each have less than 800 hours of use. o New Sony Stereo with both indoor and outdoor Sony speakers still under warranty. o New Teac TV/DVD player still under warranty. o 3 Burner SMEV gas stove. o Full size microwave. o 1x Bar fridge in the Saloon, 1x Family Fridge with Freezer in the Galley and 1x Massive Built in Freezer also located in the Galley. All appliances run on both 12 volts and 240 volts. o 2x 80 Watt Solar Panelso A custom made lounge seat over the water and rear cockpit, which accommodates 4 adults and provides Davits for your tender. This addition also massively increases the cockpit area. Upholstery in cockpit, some repairs needed. o The Cockpit covers enable you to fully enclose the Cockpit, providing you with complete comfort all year round. (needs updating)o All Stainless Steel BBQ and Gas bottle. o The timber Table and entry doors have been beautifully finished with 6 coats of high gloss clear epoxy. o Near new lazy jacks, anchor snubber and with new full length zipper on boom cover. o 2x New Ferrari trampolines on the bow. o Near new full boat covers (used twice) that run from the bow back to the Cockpit, to provide additional shade and comfort. o Both the furling Genoa and the fully battened Main are in excellent condition. o Inflatable tender fits 4 adults comfortably and comes with a reliable 2hp Johnson outboard. o Rig Surveyed by Geoff Cruse in Oct 2017. No Defects. Copy of Report available. (Rigging is over 10 years old, however fully insured). o Hulls cleaned every 3 months. o There are four ways to generate power on Seanna: o By running the engines. o Through the Solar Panels. o By running the Genset. o Shore power to run the built in battery charger. o Seanna would suit a new yacht buyer at a fraction of the price. o The current owner is only the second since her launch in 2004. She received a full refit in 2010 at a total investment of $150,000. She has always been used for private purposes and never chartered. Please do not hesitate to contact World Wide Boat Brokers for more information.

name: flipper
description: Ce Catamaran FOUNTAINE PAJOT BELIZE 43 est un bateau de propriétaire, suivi et entretenu par des professionnels. Ce bateau est performant, très agréable à la mer comme au mouillage, espace nacelle confortable, cockpit agréable pouvant accueillir un grand nombre d'équipiers. C'est une version 4 cabines, avec la possibilité d''aménagement des pointes avant. Trampoline neuve. Voiles récentes, gennaker neuf sur emmagasineur Facnor 2017, spinnaler annexe et moteur Hb 6hp Yamaha 2016, suivi et factures d'entretien à disposition. Possibilité de place de port en 06 Alpes maritimes

The Belize is a very efficient sailboat and one of the fastest in her class. The sails are both easy to hoist and haul thanks to the genoa furler and to 2:1 mainsail halyard and the fully battened mainsail on ball bearing batten cars. The helm station is protected by a fixed plexiglass screen. Meticulous attention is paid to each detail for greater ease in sailing.  This boat was originally purchased by the current owners through a well known charter company ownership scheme and has been continuously in charter throughout her life. She is currently still in charter in the Grenadines and the new owners choose to leave her there and enjoy very low cost ownership. The current owners have offered to refund the charter fee for any prospective buyer who charters this boat and then decides to buy.

Ce Bélize 43 a été revu en 2017 comme le remplacement des voiles et du gréement dormant et d'autre matériel. 
.

name: aqua bar
description: World Wide Boat Brokers has the pleasure of introducing the iconic Belize 43 cruising catamaran by Fountaine Pajot, and one of their best designs to date. Named AQUA BAR she has recently been extensively upgraded by the current owners who set her up for a bucket list Pacific island cruise, which has now been effortlessly completed and now ready to sail away, in excellent condition with her new prospective owners. Hull #56 of 174 that were built in this fantastic model and fully equipped, she has many redundancies that will ensure that you minimize having issues while cruising. The Belize 43 is one of the most popular cruising catamarans. It's fast, safe, comfortable and fun. Easy to handle for a couple, yet spacious for entertaining family and friends. It is well known for its superior sailing capabilities in all weather, ease of handling and unparalleled cruising comfort. AQUA BAR is a highly sort after Owner's version with King size bed, 3 cabin 2-bathroom configuration with storage in the bows. As mentioned, the owners had a no expense spared upgrade recently that makes this vessel, as new, with a host of new options and some great features set up for long range cruising:o 2 x new 39hp Yanmar diesel engines (2017) with new sail drives (April 2018)o Antifouled (April 2018)o New Standing Rigging (2018)o New Bimini and Clears (2018)o New Flexiteek floor in cockpit and steps (2018)o New Cockpit Cushions and Window shades (2018)o New Boom Tent (2018)o New Solar additional 4 x 180W (2018)o New Wind Generator (2018)o New 1300AH House and Engine Batteries (2018)o New Enerdrive Charger (2018)o New Spinnaker (2018)o New Fusion Stereo (2018)o New Iridium Go (2018)o New RFD 4-man Liferaft (2018)o New Stainless-Steel Grab Rails (2018)o Raymarine Hybrid Touch 12"GPS/Plotter, P70 Auto Pilot, Wind and Log, Radar and AIS. o Washing Machine Sphere 3kgo Polycraft Tender with 18hp Tohatsu Electric starto Stella Watermaker 60LPH 12Vo 5 x Lewmar winches (1 x Electric)o Southern Stainless BBQo PLUS Much moreAs you can see she is loaded with so many extras, and ready for her new owners to take over.

name: aqua vitae
description:
12.5M LAVRANOS/WRIGHT CATAMARAN professionally built 1999 by David Pringle to Survey Specifications, GRP construction. 
Powered by:  2 x 100 hp Yanmar Diesel Engines with approx 3700 hrs, fuel consumption 10 litres per hour at cruise speed on each, hydraulic steering, engine regularly serviced. 
Navigation Equipment:  Compass, Icom SSB radio, VHF Radio, Cetreck 730 Autopilot, 24 mile LCD Furuno Radar, Navman 6800 colour Plotter/Sounder/Windspeed/direction, fwd looking sonar, rudder angle gauge. 
Safety Gear:  2 Auto electric & 1 Manual Bilge pumps, 4 Fire Extinguishers, 406 EPIRB Gas Solenoid switch, 2 life-rings, danbuoy, flares (ood), approx 20 life-jackets, harnesses,  parachute anchor, fenders. 
Sails & Rigging:  Rigging stainless steel 1999, Mainsail (new 2008), furling genoa, storm jib, gennaker, spinnaker pole, 2 self tailing electric winches for main halyard & sheet, 1 self tailing on mast & 2 self tailing on sheet. 
Accommodation for 12 in 2 full doubles, 4 tapered doubles, 1 large single, 2 heads with showers. holding tanks & marina outpump connections, 4 burner gas hob, oven & grill,  filtered water tap, gas heater, dining table seats 10, galley fully kitted for 20, leather saloon seating, 12 v compressor fridge & freezer, gas heater, solar panels, genset, inverter. 
Bruce anchor with 80 m chain, spare Danforth anchor chain & warp, 3M inflatable RIB with 2 hp Outboard, dinghy davits.  
Lots of spares with the vessel, equipment and tools. Moored Nelson marina. 
Contact Rob Greenwood at our Nelson Office on + 643 548 1202 or +64 272 245 172

name: fau
description:
This Boat has our DNA!      Here at the Multihull Company we were the global distributors and agents for Dolphin Catamarans and over the course of years sold over 24 of these catamarans. When the Global Financial Crisis hit we decided to shut down the shipyard in Brazil. The tooling for the boats remained there and her chief builder, Philippe Pouvreau, was asked to build a few Dolphins for Brazilians using those tools. FAU is one of these "custom Dolphins."  While she is not identical and has some different looks and features, she is the same great sailing boat, and from talking with Philippe recently he assures me she is a fine boat that he built with pride. I am bilingual English-Portugese and have been in touch with her owner and Philippe, and therefore can answer any questions you might have on this very special listing at a superb price.  Dolphins have a proven yacht design, with more than a few safe circumnavigations.  For anyone looking to get a real sailing catamaran, that is a comfortable liveaboard as well, FAU has to be at the top of the list. 
Currently enjoying the islands off the Panama coast on the Gulf, will pass by Cayman, Florida Keys and dock in Miami in February.

name: kapai
description:
Manta Catamarans are an iconic American brand with an eventful history dating back to 1993. Manta catamarans have explored the globe and been loved by their owners so much that they have a special owners association. We are delighted to be offering Kapai to new owners to enjoy this elite group and live their dream. 
Kapai has a large, comfortable cockpit with a wonderful swing seat mounted on the arch support giving helm-height views from the stern. The entire area is covered by an alloy bimini top, roll up side curtains and clears. 
Inside, the saloon is spacious with galley up, a large working bench area, saloon seating and table. The surround view of scenery and activity is inspiring. 
Kapai, like all Manta’s, is a three cabin, owner’s version; it has two double cabins plus a third with twin singles. The owner’s cabin has a full ensuite while the guest cabins share a centrally located shower and toilet. 
In 2014 Kapai was fitted with a new sails and rig. She sails well with a fully battened main and self tacking headsail incorporating a camber spar fitted inside the sail to control sail shape. 
Never chartered Kapai has happily sailed from Florida to New Zealand with her current owners who are now on their way to pursue a new dream.

description:
FAU is a 2013 Dolphin 42 Ocema that was built to very high standards in northern Brazil by Dolphin Catamarans. 
The owners had the boat built and have enjoyed 5 years of wonderful cruising from Brazil to the BVI's and everywhere in between. The boat is presently in Bocos del Toros, Panama and a very much for sale. 
The owners have been extremely pleased with both the boats sailing abilities and the level of construction quality. 
Fau features: 
Low hours on both engines 
Generator 
Air conditioning 
Good electronics 
Dinghy and outboard 
4 staterooms/ 2 heads 
And much more!

A very well maintained example of a Marstrom Composites Extreme 40, ex SAP Extreme. 
SAP Extreme are one of the most well established teams on the circuit and as such this boat has been maintained to the enth degree. 
This Extreme 40 has been modified such that it can be raced competitively outside of the one design class, however the modifications can be easily removed and the boat can be put back into the class legal set up.

This 3 Stateroom 2 Head Version Is Ready To Cruise To The Islands Or You Can Buy I Charter As Its The Ideal Platform For Charters.  
Twin Yanmar Diesels With Plenty Of Upgrades In The Last 2 Years. Ready To Go & The Seller Is Buying Another Boat & Wants To Make A Deal.

name: calusa
description:
SV Calusa is the classic Robertson & Caine 42 Leopard designed by Naval architects Simonis Voogd Design and constructed in the Cape Town South African boatyard of Robertson & Caine. A sturdy and solid sailing catamaran well suited to offshore cruising.Built in 2004 Calusa’s second owners are retiring from blue water sailing after nearly 10 years sailing some of the well-used routes of the world. To do this they converted Calusa from a coastal sailor to a blue water sailor. She is in ready- to -go mode. An upgrade to the propulsion the propellor is a fethering German made Variprofile VP-76/LH 
Calusa has been regularly maintained and serviced as she sailed from one season to the next. The 40 HP Yanmar diesel engines have run 5000 – 5200 hrs. The mast, sails and rigging are only 2 years old. Performance improvements have been gained by fitting feathering props, sails cut to sail better into the wind, the purchase of a 170 m2 Istec Parasailor spinnaker.The hull is made of composite fiberglass and balsa above the waterline and fibreglass below. The keels are sacrificial, and the rudders have the protection of a skeg. There are five Lewmar winches on deck that are powered by an electric hand-held drilling machine fitted with a bit that fits all the winches. This is driven by a Honda 2000 generator.The anchor is a 27kg Rocna on 200ft of chain and pulled up with an electrically controlled Lofrans Tigres 1500 anchor winch. 
The helm is a wheel which is aided by a Raymarine autopilot. Navigational aids added include a Garmin chart plotter, Garmin Radar, depth sounder and wind instrument.The original canvas bimini over the spacious cockpit has been replaced with a fibre glassed ply top designed to also catch rainwater which feeds into 2 x 400 litres water tanks. The hard top is also fitted with 4 X 225 watt (900 watt) solar panels which meet most of the boat’s electrical needs. In times of bad weather, the engine, or the battery charger run by the Honda 2000, supplement.Calusa has a 110 watt electrical system and all equipment and tools on board fit this, including the air-conditioning system which runs off 110 watt shore power. 
Calusa has 4 double bedrooms each with a toilet/vanity/ shower. The kitchen and saloon lie adjacent to one another and the kitchen windows face forward so an eye can be kept on the sea there as well, when needed.The kitchen is fitted with corian tops, an LPG gas 2 burner top and oven as well as an built in fridge / freezer. The navigation table is in the saloon and sits below the switch board and panels fitted with the Ham/SSB radio, the pactor, the VHF , and a radio /cd player plus numerous charging stations. While she can sleep in excess of 8 people Calusa can easily be sailed by two people. It is noteworthy that the current owners were never bruised while sailing Calusa due to well thought out internal design. Calusa comes with her 2011 AB 9.5 inflatable dinghy. 
Currently in Malaysia and is available for inspection by appointment only.

name: santa cruz
description:
LBSS is delighted to offer CATANA 41 Ocean Class ‘SANTA CRUZ’ For Sale. 
  
Built in 2008, this 41 is the smallest catamaran in the CATANA range yet her performance ability is enormous.  SANTA CRUZ sails exceptionally well with the assistance of her dagger boards so ideally suited to boat Buyer seeking an exhilarating sailing vessel combined with the space and comfort CATANA are renowned for in their catamarans. 
Powered by2 new twin VOLVO D130 39hp diesel engines(05/2017), SANTA CRUZ cruises comfortably at 6kn with a top speed of approximately 9kn.  Her comprehensive range of electronics (including AIS (new 2016) together with 
4 x 225 A/H (2016) House Batteries, 300W Solar Panels, 60L p/h Aquabase watermaker and 40L hot water cylinder make SANTA CRUZ a perfect live aboard or holiday home. 
Accommodation comprises four Double cabins, two heads with showers (plus deck shower), a large saloon/dinette with seating for eight and very spacious cockpit.  Headroom in the Saloon is an amazing 200cm. 
The galley is equipped with Force 10 stove and oven and accessible equally well from the cockpit or saloon entertaining areas. 
SANTA CRUZ has recently been hauled out for antifouling and anode replacement and had full engine service with oil change all in 2016 so she is ready to go.  Don’t delay in requesting an appointment to inspect – she will be quickly snapped up!

name: sea joy
description:
PRICE REDUCED TO $249,000
 Ever wanted a modern yacht with unmatched performance? The Farrier-F41 is just what you're looking for. Custom Built in 2007 (completed in 2011), the Farrier-F41 Sailing Yacht is the epitome of performance, class and luxury. The F-41 is a performance cruising catamaran and the first 'two huller' from the renowned sport-tri designer Ian Farrier, owner of Farrier Marine in New Zealand. As with his definitive trimaran models, the F-41 is designed to be a safe, roomy cruiser, with outstanding speed and handling. Race-winning capability is central to Farrier's success, without sacrificing interior space, seaworthiness or structural integrity.  The high performance of the F-41 is achieved through the lightweight hull construction techniques and highly efficient rig, areas where Ian Farrier was able to draw on his vast past experience of designing and developing innovative multihulls. The F-41 is essentially a yacht cruiser and will appeal especially to those with experience of Farrier designs who now want to move up to a larger craft with more accommodation and facilities for live-aboard and long passage-making.  Sea Joy offers a comfortable four stateroom interior with two bathrooms equipped with showers. The sailing yacht also features a brand new kitchen, salon area with bench seating, electrical system, windows, stainless steel lifelines, and more. This sailing yacht combines style and comfort with speed and efficiency. Your adventure in style awaits!

This is a listing for a 2005 Lagoon 410S2 refited in 2017-2018. The boat is in perfect operating condition. With a impressive list of upgrades from 2017-2018, She is up to date and ready to charter or sail away. No damages from Hurricanes as she was out of path. This is a 4 cabins/4heads layout. 
Please see the extensive list of upgrades in the other description area

name: vite & rêves
description:
This Catana 401 'Vite & Rêves' is French registered and VAT paid and is presented in great condition. She comes with a a carbon mast, bow sprit, full set of sails including genaker and spinnaker NEW last year, all new running rigging and all the equipment needed for ocean crossing such as water maker, solar panels, hydro generator, navigation equipment including radar, and much much more. 
Her previous owner sailed her across to the Caribbean and back and so she is a tried and tested performance cruising catamaran ready to go anywhere! Her twin daggerboards, for which Catana are renowned, enable her to go to windward with a keel depth of 2 meters and then retreat into the shallows by reducing her draft to less than 0.8m.  
Her vast cockpit will seat 8 persons and the saloon table will seat 6 persons. She has 4 double cabins and 2 heads. Her current owner has made many improvements throughout. NEW photos to follow soon. 
VAT paid and ready to go. This is the only example of this highly efficient and capable performance cruising catamaran currently on the international market. 
We now welcome all serious enquiries and viewing requests.

Light displacement and efficiency under sails because of the complete sail set and the carbon mast / textile lateral rigging. The boat is currently being used by a sailing school and the layout is simple and functional. Two double aft cabins, one skipper single cabin; two shower rooms. The choice for outboard engines is relevant to gain weight and simplicity. Engines are new, the original sails are in good state, always well handled by a professional skipper. A catamaran for fast and comfortable cruises.
